description: CSC has a requirement to replace/reupgrade the white power systems at Springhill short service correction in Springhills N.",

### Details of Requirement

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) seeks to conduct a feasibility study for upgrading the electrical infrastructure at Springhill Institution in Nova Scotia, Canada. The study will provide a detailed assessment of the existing normal and emergency power systems and evaluate options for replacing the equipment
